original_text: “You shall count seven weeks. Begin to count the seven weeks from the time the sickle is first put to the standing grain.
korean_text: 일곱 주를 셀지니 곡식에 낫을 대는 첫 날부터 일곱 주를 세어

sentences.original_text: Begin to count the seven weeks
from the time the sickle is first put to the standing grain.
sentences.korean_translation: 낫을 곡식 단에 처음 대는 때로부터.
